data.title: Jane Augusta (Washington) Thornton (1740-1833)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Jane (Washington) Thornton born 1740 Wakefield, Westmoreland, Virginia died 1833 Thornton Hill, Rappahannock,  Virginia including ancestors + descendants + 5 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text: Jane Augusta Thornton formerly Washington Born Apr 1740 in Wakefield, Westmoreland, Virginia Ancestors Daughter of Augustine Washington Jr. and Ann (Aylett) Washington Wife of John Thornton — married [date unknown] [location unknown] Descendants Died 18 Oct 1833 at age 93 in Thornton Hill, Rappahannock, Virginia Profile last modified 2 Jul 2024 | Created 14 May 2013 This page has been accessed 2,949 times. Biography Jane Augusta Washington. [1][2][3][4][5][6][7][8][9] Born Apr 1756. Wakefield, Westmoreland, Virginia, United States. [10][11][12] [13] Died 4 Oct 1833. Thornton Hill, Rappahannock, Virginia, United States. [14] [15][16] Residence 1830, Culpeper, Virginia, USA. [17] Marriage Husband John Unknown. Wife Jane Augusta Unknown. Child: Nancy Augusta Unknown. Marriage 1784 [18] Husband @P51@. Wife Anne Aylett. Child: Jane Augusta Unknown. Marriage 1763 Virginia, United States. [19][20] Died. 18 OCT 1833. Thornton Hill, Rappahannock, Virginia. Age: 77. Buried Thad Rogers Cemetery, Clyde, Haywood County, North Carolina.
